string-array.name: tutorial_000_a
string-array.item: Remember the Drop Seed\nthat I gave you?
Here in the main menu,\nyou can find it in the item storage.
Open the drawer by dragging the handle upwards.
And you should see the Drop Seed there!

string-array.name: tutorial_000_b
string-array.item: Now that you have the Drop Seed.
See the three empty pots over there?
Drag the seed over to the front pot.

string-array.name: tutorial_000_c
string-array.item: Now you have planted the Drop Seed.
But what is a seed to do without water?
See the water pail over there?
Try dragging it to the seeded pot and see what happens!
